q: why do they want to make a cake
pred: The person in the video is making a cake using a mixer. They are adding ingredients such as eggs, sugar, and flour to the mixer. The person is also adding a cake mix to the mixer. The cake is then placed in the oven and baked. After baking, the cake is removed from the oven and allowed to cool. The person then adds frosting to the cake. The video ends with the person cutting the cake into slices.
